org.omancode.r.ui

Class RObjectTreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omancode.r.ui.RObjectTreeBuilder

  • public class RObjectTreeBuilder
extends Object
    Builds a JTree that represents the objects in an R environment.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface)
      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from the set of all objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
      RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface, String dataframe, String includeClass)
      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
      RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface, String dataframe, String[] includeClasses)
      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create RObjectNodes underneath parent node from array of nodes.
      String getInfo(String rname)
      Get info for a particular R object.
      RObjectNode[] getParts(String rname)
      Get the parts that make up an R object, or an empty array if the R object has no parts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RObjectTreeBuilder

        public RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface)
                   throws RFaceException
        Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from the set of all objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
        Parameters:
        rInterface - r interface
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem getting objects

      • RObjectTreeBuilder

        public RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface,
                  String dataframe,
                  String includeClass)
                   throws RFaceException
        Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
        Parameters:
        rInterface - r interface
        dataframe - name of a dataframe. If specified only this dataframe will be present in the tree. If null then all objects in the environment will be present in the tree.
        includeClass - specify a single class of object to display, or null to display objects of any class.
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem getting objects

      • RObjectTreeBuilder

        public RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface,
                  String dataframe,
                  String[] includeClasses)
                   throws RFaceException
        Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
        Parameters:
        rInterface - r interface
        dataframe - name of a dataframe. If specified only this dataframe will be present in the tree. If null then all objects in the environment will be present in the tree.
        includeClasses - specify the classes of object to display, or null to display objects of any class.
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem getting objects

    • Method Detail

      • getTree

        public JTree getTree()
        Get the JTree for display.
        Returns:
        jtree

      • addNodes

        public final void addNodes(DefaultMutableTreeNode parent,
            RObjectNode[] nodes)
        Create RObjectNodes underneath parent node from array of nodes.
        Parameters:
        parent - parent node
        nodes - map of strings to create RObjectNodes from.

      • getParts

        public final RObjectNode[] getParts(String rname)
                             throws RFaceException
        Get the parts that make up an R object, or an empty array if the R object has no parts.
        Parameters:
        rname - r object name
        Returns:
        array of nodes created from parts
        Throws:
        RFaceException - if problem getting part information from R

      • getInfo

        public final String getInfo(String rname)
        Get info for a particular R object. Info returned depends on the R object class and could be dimensions/length etc.
        Parameters:
        rname - r object name
        Returns:
        info
